name: Is Last 3 Calendar Years
description: This value is true if the date is between the beginning of calendar year 2 years ago from yesterday to yesterday's end of month. For example, if yesterday is June 10, 2022, then dates between January 1, 2020 and June 30, 2022 are set to true.
